issue.title: Hide "advanced search" label when unnecessary
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

In a CATALOG context, if you have no advanced search criteria activated, the label "advanced search" in the front-end should not be visible ---> it brings nothing !



**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

In such case, I would also add that "Simple search" button is not needed like button "Advanced search".
